glsa.title: rgmanager: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability was found in rgmanager, allowing for privilege escalation.

background.p: rgmanager is a clustered resource group manager.

description.p: A vulnerability has been discovered in rgmanager. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.

impact.p: A local attacker could gain escalated privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All rgmanager users should upgrade to the latest version:
